Articles.Content:
I'm looking for an add-on that gives more scenarios for me to play. I don't really care what the scenario is just looking for fun ones.

Also can anyone point me in the direction of how to make my own scenarios?

What do you mean, exactly, by scenarios?

Different career progression? Different contracts?

What do you mean, exactly, by scenarios?

Different career progression? Different contracts?

Scenarios like the stock ones where you are given a situation and you have to solve it, like asteroid redirect mission. Usually with limitations like using only a pre-built craft or such, and said craft could be in some pre-determined orbits, etc.

Scenarios like the stock ones where you are given a situation and you have to solve it, like asteroid redirect mission. Usually with limitations like using only a pre-built craft or such, and said craft could be in some pre-determined orbits, etc.

Yeah, that's what I'm talking about. Any ideas?
There are just not a lot of demand for them. I don't think there are a lot, if any.

There are just not a lot of demand for them. I don't think there are a lot, if any.

Well I would take a shot at making some if I knew how. It has to be possible because when I tried out the Kethane mod there was a tutorial that came along with it. If you can make tutorials I would think you could make some scenarios. I could be wrong but I would love to know.
